##Assignment Number 2

###General functions
1.
Help(topic)

2.
?topic

This function is used when you are looking for the help page documentation of a certain topic in R.
For example you want to understand the summing function
```{r}
?sum
```
3.
Is()

This function is used to see if a certain obkect in R is part of a class you selected. This is a logical statement.If it is in the class or if it is not in the class then True or False will be returned
